channel.title: Miles, Luke on c13u's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Miles, Luke on c13u's Blog

item.title: Privacy on the Web
item.description: Just Click on this Simple URL One can use curl -v <url> to see all of the redirections and cookies set. [] I tried this on https://tinyurl.com/yyte6pqv, which points to https://www.c13u.com/socioeconomics/2020-11-21-experiments-in-social-economics/, but didn’t observe any 3rd party cookies. tinyurl.com did set a cookie, but that’s probably expected[?] [] found that their tiny URL landed them at https://redirect.viglink.com?key=a7e37b5f6ff1de9cb410158b1013e54a&u=https%3A%2F%2Fzoom.us%2Fj%2F123456789&prodOvrd=RAC, which eventually goes to https://zoom.us/j/123456789. I manually created another tiny URL for the Zoom link and got the redirect.
